co.cask.cdap.api.worker

Interface Worker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgramLifecycle<WorkerContext>, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWorker

    public interface Worker
extends Runnable, ProgramLifecycle<WorkerContext>
    Defines a Worker.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(WorkerConfigurer configurer)
      Configure a Worker.
      void stop()
      Request to stop the running worker.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.ProgramLifecycle

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(WorkerConfigurer configurer)
        Configure a Worker.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Request to stop the running worker. This method will be invoked from a different thread than the one calling the Runnable.run() method.
